mapper.insert: INSERT INTO nh_source_bill (src_name,id, entitycode, batch_no, datasource, srcsystemcode, srctablename, action, period, src_data_msg,sysTime) VALUES (#{srcName}, #{id}, #{entityCode}, #{batchNo}, #{dataSource}, #{srcSystemCode}, #{srcTableName}, #{action}, #{period}, #{srcDataMsg}, #{sysTime})
